data.title: Bond HP Inc US428236BK87 in USD 1.55%, expired
data.meta_description: Prospectus of the bond HP Inc US428236BK87 in USD 1.55%, maturity 30/05/2014 The website www.oblible.com is the international bonds bible, whether they are perpetual, with fixed rates, with floating rates , this website give you access to several informations about these bonds , including the interest rate , the bond maturity, the bond expiry, the bond Standard & Poor's ( S&P ) notiation, the bon Moody's notation, the minimum amount you can buy, the outstanding amout, the ISIN code and also gives you access to the bond prospectus in PDF format for free, and its price on the market
data.text:
Detailed description The Bond issued by HP Inc ( United States ) , in USD, with the ISIN code US428236BK87, pays a coupon of 1.55% per year.

The coupons are paid 2 times per year and the Bond maturity is 30/05/2014

The Bond issued by HP Inc ( United States ) , in USD, with the ISIN code US428236BK87, was rated NR by Moody's credit rating agency.

The Bond issued by HP Inc ( United States ) , in USD, with the ISIN code US428236BK87, was rated NR by Standard & Poor's ( S&P ) credit rating agency.
